comments.body: add comment that this plugin was an android support plugin at this version in time
There's  `section` above, which indicates that this plugin contains support libraries.
check that something imports android.support.* so we know that this test tests stuff :) (assuming that the FirebaseApp exposes some android.support classes somewhere in the APIs)
it's too late to check for `android.support.*` here, since all previous references are now "androidX" equivalent. I did add a check for some androidx dependencies.
check that things now import androidx.* if possible
